    • Method Detail

      • addComponent

        public static boolean addComponent(java.awt.Container container,
                                   java.awt.GridBagLayout layout,
                                   java.awt.Component component,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   double weightx,
                                   double weighty,
                                   java.awt.Insets insets)
        Adds a Component to a Container using the GridBagLayout.
        Parameters:
        container - Container to which the Component will be added
        layout - Used GridBagLayout object
        component - Component which will be added to the Container
        x - x coordinate of the Component in the grid
        y - y coordinate of the Component in the grid
        width - width of the Component
        height - height of the Component
        weightx - x weight of the Component
        weighty - y weight of the component
        insets - Insets which defines the distances around the Component
        Returns:
        boolean false if exception occurred

      • log

        public static boolean log(java.lang.String text,
                          java.io.File file,
                          boolean printTimestamp)
        Deprecated. SimpleLog handles this much more comfortably and professionally
        Writes a String (with a timestamp) to a File.
        Parameters:
        text - The String, that will be written to the file
        file - The File where the text will be saved to
        printTimestamp - If true, there will be a timestamp in front of the text
        Returns:
        boolean false if exception occurred

        Returns:
        The content of the file
        Throws:

      • readFileToArray

        public static java.lang.String[] readFileToArray(java.io.File file)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a given File and returns the text as String[]. Elements are seperated by lines
        Parameters:
        file - The File to read
        Returns:
        The content of the file as String[]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file isn't found or can't be read

      • countFileLines

        public static int countFileLines(java.io.File file)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Counts the number of lines in the given File. Empty lines will be skipped
        Parameters:
        file - The File to count the lines of
        Returns:
        amount of lines
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file is not found or can't be read

                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Send HTTP requests to a webserver and fetch the answer
        Parameters:
        url - The URL you want to send a request to
        Returns:
        The answer from that URL
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if connection failed

      • downloadFileFromURL

        public static boolean downloadFileFromURL(java.net.URL url,
                                          java.io.File saveFile)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Downloads a File from an URL and saves it to the computer
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the File
        saveFile - The path where the File should be saved
        Returns:
        success
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if HTTP error code is returned
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file has not be found

      • searchIPs

        public static java.lang.String[] searchIPs(boolean includeLocalhost)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Search for all IPs on the local network using the arp -a command. Works only on Windows machines
        Parameters:
        includeLocalhost - If true, the first entry will be 'localhost'
        Returns:
        A String[] containing the IPs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if command can not be executed

        Returns:
        The assembled String
